Nightshift vibrates with anger.  Being one of level headedness most of the =
time, anger was quite rare for him.  Straight Shot quickly takes Elita into=
 her protective custody as she exits her comrade who is quick to transform.=


" Nightshift, losing your temper isn't gonna do anyone any good."

He nar=
rows his eyes and cracks his knuckles.

" I think it's time we did things N=
injabot style.  It's someth'n Rodimus ain't familiar with and I know we can=
 get a jump on 'em that way.  So here's the plan, You go with Elita, make s=
ure you cloak your signatures and follow Rodimus's trail the way Master Yok=
itron taught us.  There's no way he can fool any of us if we stick ta that.=
"

Straight Shot nods.

 " Roger that, Master Nightshift.  Your title is lo=
ng overdue."

They bow to each other as they head off in opposite direction=
s.  Following the art of the Ninjabot, the duo, along with Elita, gets righ=
t down to business.
Straight Shot smiles to the cub.

" How would you like =
ta learn Kung Fu Turbo Tiger Style?"

Perpetually on the move and constantl=
y busy.
